sub_title: Head of GPO Business Intelligence at ICL Group
summary:
I am a Procurement executive with 12+ years of experience with a strong background in procurement, marketing, business development, and project management.

At ICL group I am the heading the GPO Business Intelligence team that supports our global procurement department with strategic procurement decisions by providing critical insights into the markets.

I am responsible for the team that gathers and analyses procurement data to identify risks and opportunities for improving the procurement operations in the raw material, Logistics, and Indirect Spend categories.

I work closely with global heads and VPs to identify and lead new BI opportunities in the areas like sustainability, spend analysis, and bespoke software creation to support processes to name a few and set team KPIs  & execution plans based on the agreed company vision & goals.

projects.title: Sensitivity Analysis Of New Up Coming Chemical Plant and Market Feasibility Study
projects.description:
TYPE: SUMMAR INTERNSHIP PROGRAM
COMPANY: MEGHMANI ORGANICS LTD
PROJECT DETAIL:
Detailed Project Appraisal Report of the new chemical plant containing detailed analysis of its market feasibility in the time of recession.
I.	The project consist of the study of the Techno-Economic Feasibility of  Rs 500 Cr New Upcoming Chloro-Alkali plant of Meghmani FineChem Ltd(MFL), which was coming up in Dahej .
II.	 This study consisted of the initial techno- economic feasibility analysis and then in second phase, financial analysis ,which  consist of making an assumption sheet( data sheet) .And then based on it ,working out different cost of the project like Man power cost, Capital cost, working capital cost, Fixed asset allocation ,Profitability study , Cash-flow statement and then calculation of DSCR  and payback period of the project is done .
III.	Based on all this calculation the final conclusion on the feasibility of the project was drawn.

profile_positions.description:
Market Intelligence

A deep understanding of key purchasing markets and associated markets along the value chains allows me to provide
cost analysis, supply and demand drivers and trends, to support strategy creation for the relevant ICL products and services.
Utilize internal business and external market information to forecast future industry performance and make recommendations to procurement and the business during all stages of the sourcing process.
Monitor & analyze global macroeconomic events and prepare the procurement organization and businesses for potential impact by creating reports, newsletters, dashboards ad via weekly/bi-weekly updates.

Knowledge Management

Integrate internal and external information, understand ICL purchasing markets, build a knowledge base.
Serve as knowledge centre/point of contact for the Purchasing organization and Business
Managing the Team Budget to procure 3rd party market information via vendors

Procurement Excellence

Provide analytical support to create tailored tools (Forecasting models / Benchmarks etc) to enhance procurement and business processes.
Support procurement IT with implementing tools for internal reporting, KPI measurements, spend & category management, and strategic sourcing.
Lead and facilitate procurement and cross-functional projects.
Manage the execution of purchase orders

Innovation & Digital Transformation

Monitor IT trends and identify emerging technologies, understand their relevance to  business needs and implement best-fit tools via in-house project liaising with 3rd party vendors

Achievements in Current Role 
-EIPM Certification-Global Sourcing Manager program
-ICL Recognition Award 2018- Creative building of algorithms for the forecasting model
-ICL Leaders Recognition Award 2020-Innovation and excellence for the Spend visibility
